title: Mariah Carey, Andrea Bocelli, Ghali charm the stage at the opening ceremony
desc: The Winter Olympics 2026 officially started on 6th Feb with a spectacular opening ceremony, running through Feb 22 in Italy. With remarkable and unforgettable moments, the night featured stunning performances by Mariah Carey, Ghali, and Sabrina Impacciatore.
